price: Umunsi tuzabahanisha igihano gikomeye, mu by’ukuri tuzabaryoza (ibyo bakoze).
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
